expression.saqlExpression: case when previous('OwnerCount') is null then  0 when 'Field' =="Owner" then previous('OwnerCount') + 1 else previous('OwnerCount') end
case when next('CaseId') is null then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: isCaseTask
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Case.CaseNumber' is null then "False" else "True" end

computedFields.name: Another_TE
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Case.OwnerId.Name' != 'CreatedById.Name' then "Yes" else "No" end

computedFields.name: TE_Assist
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'OwnerId.Name' == 'Case.Support_Tier_3_Owner_lkup__c.Name' then "Yes" else "No" end

computedFields.name: Subject_type
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Subject' matches "GHO" then "GHO" when 'Subject' matches "Tier" then "Tier" else "Other" end

computedFields.name: Is_CreatedBy_MCS
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CreatedById.Name' matches "(MCS)" then "MCS User"  else "Other" end

computedFields.name: LastActor_IsSupportEnginner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'LastActorUserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'LastActor.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'LastActor.IsManager__c' == "false" and date('LastActor.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'LastActor.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'LastActor.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !( 'LastActor.Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'LastActor.Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: LastActor_IsSupportEnginner

computedFields.name: LastActor_Support_Segmentation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LastActor.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'LastActor.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: LastActor_Support_Segmentation

computedFields.name: LastActorVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LastActorVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'LastActorVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.label: LastActorVendorManagerNameFinal

computedFields.name: FirstSurvey
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'FirstClicktoolsId'=='Id' then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: FirstSurvey

computedFields.name: IsRedAccount
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'AccountId.Open_Red_Account_Issues__c' >0 then "TRUE"
else "FALSE"
end
computedFields.label: IsRedAccount

computedFields.name: SupportHub
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when
'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["Japan Support"]
or 'SuccessCenter' in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "JAPAN Support"

when (('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' in["SFDC", "SFDC Dublin", "SFDC Hyderabad", "SFDC INDY", "SFDC Portland", "SFDC Tokyo"])or('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC MC")) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "ProM" and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "Proactive Monitoring"

when
('Product_GCSC' in ["Marketing Cloud","Pardot"]  or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["Global Marketing Cloud Support"])
and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in ["Japan Support"] and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "Global Marketing Cloud"

when
((
( 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER Mission Critical Success (MCS)"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["AMER Portland SC","AMER INDY SC"]
or
(
   'SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["AMER","LACA"]
   )
   )and  'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS" and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   ) or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER Core Signature Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "AMER Signature Support"
   
   when
((
( 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["APAC Core Signature Support","APAC Mission Critical Success (MCS)"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["APAC HYD SC"]
or
(
   'SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["APAC","India"]
   )
   )and  'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS" and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   ) or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["APAC Core Signature Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "APAC Signature Support"

when
((
( 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["EMEA Mission Critical Success (MCS)"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["EMEA Dublin SC"]
or
(
   'SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["EMEA"]
   )
   )and  'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS" and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   ) or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["EMEA Core Signature Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "EMEA Signature Support"
   
   
when
(('Product_GCSC' in ["CPQ"] or
'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c'in ["Global CPQ"])
and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in ["Japan Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "Global CPQ"

when
((
('Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER Premier Internal Admin (PSA)","AMER - FRD - Support Management","AMER Premier Internal Admin (PSA)","AMER Premier Internal Tier 2 (PSA)","AMER Premier Outsourced Admin","AMER SAS","AMER-CHI-T2","AMER-CHI-T3","AMER-FRD-T1","AMER-FRD-T2","AMER-FRD-T3","AMER-SF-T2,Specialists - AMER - Consumer","BRZ-T1,BRZ-T2","BRZ-T3"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["AMER Portland SC","AMER INDY SC"]
or
('SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["AMER","LACA"]
   )
   )and !('Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS") and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   )or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER Core Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "AMER Core Support"

when
((
('Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["APAC - MEL - Support Management","APAC Premier Internal Admin (PSA)","APAC TS Tier 2","APAC TS Tier 3","APAC-MEL-T1","APAC-MEL-T2","APAC-MEL-T3"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["APAC HYD SC"]
or
('SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["APAC","India"]
   )
   )and !('Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS") and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   )or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["APAC Core Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "APAC Core Support"

when
((
('Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["EMEA - LON - Support Management","EMEA Premier T2","EMEA TS Tier 2","EMEA TS Tier 2 DEV","EMEA TS Tier 3","EMEA-LON-T1","EMEA-LON-T2","EMEA-London-T2"]
or
'SuccessCenter' in ["EMEA Dublin SC"]
or
('SuccessCenter' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","Cognizant Delivery Partner Program"] and 'Agent_Support_Region__c' in ["EMEA"]
   )
   )and !('Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS") and 'Product_GCSC' in ["Core"]
   )or 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["EMEA Core Support"]) and 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' not in["Japan Support","Japan Tokyo SC"] and 'SuccessCenter' not in ["Japan Tokyo SC"] then "EMEA Core Support" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: SupportHub

computedFields.name: Support_Role_Name
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( 'OwnerId.Role.Name' matches  "CFL - GS - TS" or 'OwnerId.Role.Name' matches  "Support") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: Support_Role_Name

computedFields.name: IsGOVFlag
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Case_Owner__c.Cross_Cloud_Skill_Group__c' in ["GOV"] then "Yes" when 'Support_Case_Owner__c.Cross_Cloud_Skill_Group__c' is null then "Blank" else "No" end
computedFields.label: IsGOVFlag

computedFields.name: SupportEntitlement
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'Support_Level__c' in ["Basic", "Partner Basic"] then "Standard" when 'Support_Level__c' in ["Partner Premier", "Partner Premier + Account Manager","Partner Premier Case Pack","Premier"] then "Premier" when 'Support_Level__c' in ["Signature", "Premier Priority"] then "Signature" when 'Support_Level__c' is null then "Global"
else "Global"
end
computedFields.label: SupportEntitlement

computedFields.name: InvestigationBugStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'isInvestigation'=="True" && 'isBug' =="False" then "Investigation without Bug" when 'isInvestigation'=="True" && 'isBug' =="True" then "Investigation with Bug" when 'isInvestigation'=="False" && 'isBug' =="True" then "Bug with No Investigation" when 'isInvestigation'=="False" && 'isBug' =="False" then "No Bug No Investigation" else "NA"
end
computedFields.label: InvestigationBugStatus

computedFields.name: CloudMerged
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when 'Cloud__c' matches "Industries" || 'Cloud__c' matches "Industry"  then "Industries " 
 when 'Cloud__c' matches "Commerce" then "Commerce " 
  when 'Cloud__c' matches "Marketing" then "Marketing " 
    when 'Cloud__c' matches "Platform" then "Platform " 
     when 'Cloud__c' matches "Sales-" || 'Cloud__c' in ["Sales" ,"Sales Cloud"]   then "Sales" 
      when 'Cloud__c' matches "Community" then "Experience" 
            when 'Cloud__c' matches "Pardot" then "Pardot" 
            when 'Cloud__c' matches "Service-" || 'Cloud__c' in ["Service Cloud","Service"] then "Service" 
else "Other Clouds" end
computedFields.label: CloudMerged

computedFields.name: IsPartner
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when (('RecordTypeId.Name' == "Platform / Application Support" ) ||  ('RecordTypeId.Name' == "Support" && 'Support_Level__c' in ["Partner", "Partner Basic", "Partner Premier","Partner Premier + Account Manager", "Partner Developer", "Partner Premier Case Pack"])) then "Yes" else "No" end
computedFields.label: IsPartner

computedFields.name: Key
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'Reason'+"-"+'General_Application_Area__c'+"-"+'FunctionalArea__c'
computedFields.label: Key

computedFields.saqlExpression:
case

when
(
   (
      ('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC PDT" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS PDT") or ('Reason' == "Pardot") ) or
      ('OwnerId' in ["00G0M000004fb1VUAQ"]))  then "Pardot"
      
      when
( 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC SB" or 'StartsWithQTC' == "True" or 'OwnerId' == "00G0M0000043dHjUAI") then "CPQ"
when
( 
   ('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "VTI MC") or ('Reason' == "Marketing") or ('Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' in ["Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3"]) or ('OwnerId' == "00G30000001eavQEAQ")
   ) 
    then "Marketing Cloud"
 when (
    (
    !('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC PDT" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "VTI MC" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS PDT")&& !('Reason' in ["Marketing","Pardot"]) && 'ContainsQTC' == "False"&& !('Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' in ["Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3"]) && !('OwnerId' in ["00G30000001eavQEAQ","00G0M000004fb1VUAQ","00G0M0000043dHjUAI"])
    ) 
    or('OwnerId' in ["00G30000001eMNFEA2", "00G30000001eMNtEAM", "00G30000000f4pVEAQ","00G30000000xiohEAA", "00G0M000004XsnmUAC","00530000007RAeCAAW"]) 
    )
     then "Core" else "Other" end
computedFields.name: Product_GCSC
computedFields.label: Product_GCSC

computedFields.name: OwnerId.Role.Name_W_Null
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'OwnerId.Role.Name' is null then "Blank" else 'OwnerId.Role.Name' end
computedFields.label: OwnerId.Role.Name_W_Null

computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
 when ('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "SFDC"|| 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "ACN"|| 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS"|| 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "Cognizant") || (('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' is null|| 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "Blank") && 'OwnerId' in ["00G0M000004XsnmUAC", "00G0M000004fb1VUAQ", "00G30000000f4pVEAQ", "00G30000000xiohEAA", "00G30000001eMNFEA2", "00G30000001eMNtEAM", "00G30000001eavQEAQ","00G0M0000043dHjUAI"]) then "Include" else "Exclude" end
computedFields.name: Filter
computedFields.label: Filter

computedFields.name: As_Of_Date
computedFields.saqlExpression: now()

computedFields.name: Product_Cloud
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when 'CloudMap.Product_Cloud' is null then "Uncategorized" else 'CloudMap.Product_Cloud'
end
computedFields.label: Product(Cloud)

computedFields.name: Topic_Sub_Cloud
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case 
when 'CloudMap.Sub_Topic' is null then "Uncategorized" else 'CloudMap.Sub_Topic'
end
computedFields.label: Topic(Sub-Cloud)

computedFields.name: Sub_Topic
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case 
when 'CloudMap.Topic_Sub_Cloud' is null then "Uncategorized" else 'CloudMap.Topic_Sub_Cloud'
end
computedFields.label: Sub_Topic

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when !('Global_Case__c' matches "SF") && !('Global_Case__c' matches "SN") && !('Global_Case__c' matches "QU") then "OrgCS Cases"  else "Org62 Cases" end
computedFields.name: Org62_OrgCS
computedFields.label: Org62_OrgCS

computedFields.saqlExpression:
case when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Marketing Cloud"] && 'Support_LoB__c' in [ "MC - Signature" , "MC - Premier Priority" , "MC - MCS" ,"MC - US Only Premier Priority"] )then "Signature"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Marketing Cloud"] && 'Support_LoB__c' in [ "MC - Partner Premier" , "MC - Partner Premier Case Pack" , "MC - Premier", "MC - Premier Plus" ,"MC - US Premier Plus" ,"MC - US Premier" ,"MC - US Premier" ,"MC - Premium","Premier" ] )then "Premier"
 when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Marketing Cloud"] && 'Support_LoB__c' in [ "MC - Standard" , "MC - Standard Plus" , "Standard","Standard Plus" ,"MC - Partner Developer","MC - Partner Basic","Blank"] )then "Standard"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Core", "CPQ"] && 'Support_Level__c' in [ "Signature" , "Premier Priority"] )then "Signature"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Core", "CPQ"] && 'Support_Level__c' in [ "Partner Premier" , "Partner Premier + Account Manager","Partner Premier Case Pack","Premier","Premier Plus","Premier +"] )then "Premier"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Core", "CPQ"] && 'Support_Level__c' in [ "Basic", "Partner Basic","Partner Developer","Blank"] )then "Standard"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Pardot"] && 'Pardot_Support_Level__c' in ["Pardot Partner Premier","Pardot Partner Premier Case Pack","Pardot Premier","Pardot Premier+"]) then "Premier"
when ('Product_GCSC' in ["Pardot"] && 'Pardot_Support_Level__c' in ["Pardot Partner Developer","Pardot Standard","Blank"]) then "Standard"
else "Others" end
computedFields.name: Derived_Entitlement
computedFields.label: Derived Entitlement

computedFields.name: Partner_Flag
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'AccountId.SupportLevel__c' matches "Partner" then "Partner" else "Non Partner" end
computedFields.label: Partner Flag

computedFields.name: IsSupportEngineer
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'IsManager__c' == "false" and date('Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !('Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: IsSupportEngineer

computedFields.name: Support_Segmentation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: Support_Segmentation

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'UserVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'UserVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.name: UserVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.label: UserVendorManagerNameFinal

computedFields.name: ProcessNodeName_Null
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
when ProcessNodeName is null then "Blank"
else ProcessNodeName
end
computedFields.label: ProcessNodeName_Null

computedFields.name: Time_to_Relief
computedFields.saqlExpression: date_diff("day", toDate('Case.CreatedDate_sec_epoch'),toDate('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'))

computedFields.name: OwnerCount_Bucket
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'OwnerCount' <= 2 then " 0-2" when 'OwnerCount' <=4 then " 3-4" when 'OwnerCount' <= 6 then  " 5-6" when 'OwnerCount' <= 9 then "7-9" when 'OwnerCount' > 9 then ">9" end

computedFields.name: VoteBy_IsSupportEnginner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'VoteBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'VoteBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'VoteBy.IsManager__c' == "false" and date('VoteBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'VoteBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'VoteBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !('VoteBy.Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'VoteBy.Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: VoteBy_IsSupportEnginner

computedFields.name: ClosedBy_IsSupportEngineer
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'ClosedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'ClosedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'ClosedBy.IsManager__c' == "false" and date('ClosedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'ClosedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'ClosedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !('ClosedBy.Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'ClosedBy.Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: ClosedBy_IsSupportEngineer

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'VoteBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'VoteBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.name: VoteBy_SupportSegmentation
computedFields.label: VoteBy_SupportSegmentation

computedFields.name: ClosedBy_Support_Segmentation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ClosedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'ClosedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: ClosedBy_Support_Segmentation

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'VoteByVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'VoteByVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.name: VoteByVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.label: VoteByVendorManagerNameFinal

computedFields.name: ClosedByVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ClosedByVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'ClosedByVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.label: ClosedByVendorManagerNameFinal

parameters.saqlFilter: 'Technical_Support_Satisfaction_Score__c' is not null or 'Customer_Effort_Score__c' is not null

computedFields.name: ArticleCreatedBy_IsSupportEngineer
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'ArticleCreatedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'ArticleCreatedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'ArticleCreatedBy.IsManager__c' == "false" and date('ArticleCreatedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'ArticleCreatedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'ArticleCreatedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !('ArticleCreatedBy.Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'ArticleCreatedBy.Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: ArticleCreatedBy_IsSupportEngineer

computedFields.name: LastModifiedBy_IsSupportEngineer
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - Non-Case" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "REGION" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "SPECIALIST" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "MC" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Support SVP – Version 1" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "WW Services and Adoption" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Support" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "Global Services" or 'LastModifiedBy.UserRole.Name' matches "CFL - GS - TS" ) and 'LastModifiedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["Admin", "DEV", "MCS", "MCS Primary", "MCS Technical", "Marketing Cloud T1", "Marketing Cloud T2", "Marketing Cloud T3", "ProM Management", "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer", "T1", "T2", "T3", "TX"] and 'LastModifiedBy.IsManager__c' == "false" and date('LastModifiedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Year', 'LastModifiedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Month', 'LastModifiedBy.Taking_Cases_Date__c_Day') in ["35 years ago".."current day"] and !('LastModifiedBy.Support_Group__c' in [ "Blank"])  and 'LastModifiedBy.Support_Group__c' != "SFDC CC") then "True" else "False" end
computedFields.label: LastModifiedBy_IsSupportEngineer

computedFields.name: ArticleCreatedBy_Support_Segmentation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ArticleCreatedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'ArticleCreatedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: ArticleCreatedBy_Support_Segmentation

computedFields.name: LastModifiedBy_Support_Segmentation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LastModifiedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["T2","T1","T3","Marketing Cloud T2","Marketing Cloud T3","Admin","DEV","TX"] then "Standard Support" when 'LastModifiedBy.Support_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Technical","Marketing Cloud T1","ProM Technical Engineer","MCS Primary","MCS"] then "Priority Services" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: LastModifiedBy_Support_Segmentation

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CreatedByVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'CreatedByVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.name: CreatedByVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.label: CreatedByVendorManagerNameFinal

computedFields.name: LastModifiedByVendorManagerNameFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LastModifiedByVendorManager.Name' is null then "BLANK" else 'LastModifiedByVendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.label: LastModifiedByVendorManagerNameFinal

computedFields.name: ContentGroup
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["ADMIN","Beyondcore","Communities","CRM Configuration","CRM Reporting & Dashboards","CRM Usage","Developer","Digital Engagement","Email & Desktop Integrations","Feature Activations","Government Cloud","Inbox","Integration","Mobile","Non-Profit and Higher Education","Partner Support","Performance","Security","Wave Analytics","CRM Configuration - Apps","Field Service","Accessibility"] then "Core" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["ExactTarget","Heywire","MC - Admin","MC Practices","Radian6-Buddy"] then "Deprecated" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["Japan"] then "Japan" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["B2B Commerce","Pardot","QTC","Quip","Salesforce Maps","Vlocity","MuleSoft Composer","Mobify","Datorama"] then "M&A" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["Data.com","Work.com"] then "Maintenance Only" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["MC Configuration","MC Deliverability","MC Developer","MC Partner","MC Social","MC Usage","Social.com","MC - Interaction Studio 2.0 (Evergage)"] then "Marketing Cloud" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["Other","Null Value","Video Screencasts","MyTrailhead"] then "Other" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["Accelerator","AR Ops","Certification","Customer Success","Security and Legal-Approved","TCR","Rebuild Trust","Essential Support & Adoption"] then "Not Support" when 'SKILL_GROUP_C' in ["Proactive Monitoring","Proactive Monitoring - MC","Signature - Core","Signature - MC"] then "Priority Services" else "Other" end
computedFields.label: ContentGroup

computedFields.name: Filter_PA
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Program_Architects__c' > 0 then "Program Architect" else "False" end

computedFields.name: Filter_BA
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CSE__c' > 0 then "BTA" else "False" end

computedFields.name: Filter_ITC
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ITC__c' > 0  then "ITC" else "False" end

computedFields.name: Filter_Cloud_Services
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'Filter_PA' + ";" + 'Filter_BA'+ ";" +'Filter_ITC'

computedFields.name: Age_Buckets
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Age_days__c' <=3 then " 0-3" when 'Age_days__c' <=5 then " 3-5"  when 'Age_days__c' <=10 then " 5-10" when 'Age_days__c' <=30 then "10-30" when 'Age_days__c' >30 then ">30" end

computedFields.name: IsAssigned
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when starts_with('OwnerId',"00G") then "UnAssigned" else "Assigned" end

computedFields.name: IsSupport_Tier_3_Owner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Support_Tier_3_Owner_lkup__c' is null or 'Support_Tier_3_Owner_lkup__c'  == "") then "False" else "True" end

computedFields.name: StartsWithQTC
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when starts_with('Skill_Group__c',"QTC") then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: ContainsQTC
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Skill_Group__c' matches "QTC" then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: SuccessCenter
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["Accenture Delivery Partner Program","ACN MANL Tier 1","ACN MANL Tier 2","ACN MANL Support Opertions","ACN MANL Support Management","Specialists - SC - Accenture"] then "Accenture Delivery Partner Program" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER INDY SC", "AMER TS Tier 2", "AMER-INDY-T1", "AMER-INDY-T2", "AMER TS Tier 2 DEV", "AMER TS Tier 3", "AMER-INDY-T3", "AMER - IND - T3", "LATM-INDY-T1", "AMER TS Tier 3 DEV", "AMER - IND - Support Management", "AMER - INDY - Prod Ops", "AMER TS Tier 2 Internal", "AMER - INDY - T3"] then "AMER INDY SC" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["AMER Portland SC","AMER Tier 2 Port","AMER Tier 1 Port","AMER Admin Port","AMER Tier 3 Port","AMER Dev Port"] then  "AMER Portland SC" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["APAC HYD SC","HYDR AMER TS Tier 2 DEV","HYDR Premier Internal Tier 2 AMER","HYDR Premier Internal Tier 2 EMEA","HYDR EMEA TS Tier 2 DEV","HYDR APAC TS Tier 2 DEV","HYDR Premier Internal Tier 2 APAC","HYDR Premier Internal Admin EMEA","HYDR EMEA TS Tier 2 MC DEV","HYDR Premier Internal Admin APAC","HYDR APAC TS Tier 3 DEV","HYDR EMEA TS Tier 3 DEV","HYDR AMER TS Tier 3 DEV"] then  "APAC HYD SC" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["Cognizant Delivery Partner Program","COGZ MANL Tier 2","COGZ PUNE Tier 2","COGZ PUNE Tier 1","COGZ PUNE Admin","COGZ DESM Tier 2","COGZ BUDP Tier 2","COGZ BUDP Admin","COGZ DESM Admin","COGZ MANL Triage","COGZ MANL Support Operations","COGZ PUNE Support Operations","COGZ BUDP Support Operations","Specialists - Cognizant - SC","Specialists - SC - Cognizant","COGZ PUNE Support Management","COGZ MANL Support Management","COGZ DESM Support Operations"] then  "Cognizant Delivery Partner Program" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["EMEA Dublin SC"] then  "EMEA Dublin SC" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Delivery_Segmentation__c' in ["Japan Tokyo SC","Japan TS Tier 1","Japan TS Tier 2 Internal","JPN-TOK-T2","Japan Premier Internal Tier 2 (PSA)","Japan TS Tier 2","JPN-TOK-T1","JP Mission Critical Success (MCS)","Japan TS Tier 3","JAPAN SAS","Japan","Japan CC","Specialists - Japan","Specialists - Japan - SL"] then  "Japan Tokyo SC" else "Others" end

computedFields.name: SkillGroup
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["CRM Configuration & Usage", "CRM Configuration","CRM Config"]  then "CRM Configuration" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["Development","Developer"] then "Developer" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["Email & Desktop Integrations","Email & Desktop Integration"]  then "Email & Desktop Integrations" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["HeyWire","Heywire"] then "HeyWire" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["MC-social.com","MC-Social.com","MC-Social Integrations","MC-Social","MC - Social"] then "MC - Social" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["MCSF-Integrations","MCSF- Integrations"]  then "MCSF- Integrations" when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["No Brand defined","No Brand Defined"]  then "No Brand Defined" else 'Skill_Group__c' end

computedFields.name: ReasonContainsMC
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Reason' matches "MC" then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: Reason_Type
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Reason' is null then "Other" when 'Reason' == "Signature" then "Proactive" else "Reactive" end

computedFields.name: Is_Tier3_Owner_MCS
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Tier_3_Owner_lkup__c.Name' matches "(MCS)" then "MCS User"  else "Other" end

computedFields.name: Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup_MCS
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS" then "MCS SubGroup"  else "Other" end

computedFields.name: Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup_MCS_PROM
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "MCS" || 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' matches "ProM Technical Engineer" then "MCS PROM SubGroup"  else "Other" end

computedFields.name: TE_Assist
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'OwnerId.Name' != 'Support_Tier_3_Owner_lkup__c.Name' then "Yes" else "No" end

computedFields.name: bug_inv
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Bug__c' is not null or 'Bug__c' != "") && ('GUS_Investigation_Number__c' is not null or 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' != "") then "BUG_INVESTIGATION" when 'Bug__c' is not null or 'Bug__c' != "" then "BUG" when 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' is not null or 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' != "" then "INVESTIGATION" else "NO_BUG_INVESTIGATION" end

computedFields.name: isBug
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Bug__c' is not null or 'Bug__c' != "" then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: isInvestigation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' is not null or 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' != "" then "True" else "False" end

computedFields.name: isBugInvestigation
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Bug__c' is not null or 'Bug__c' != "") and ('GUS_Investigation_Number__c' is not null or 'GUS_Investigation_Number__c' != "") then "True" else "False" end

case when 'Age_days__c' <=2 then " 0-2" when 'Age_days__c' <=5 then " 2-5"  when 'Age_days__c' <=10 then " 5-10" when 'Age_days__c' <=25 then "10-25"  when 'Age_days__c' <=50 then "25-50" when 'Age_days__c' >50 then "50+" end
computedFields.name: Age_Bucket_New
computedFields.label: Age_Bucket_New

computedFields.name: BillingVendor
computedFields.saqlExpression:
case
 when 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' in ["SFDC","SFDC Dublin","SFDC Hyderabad","SFDC INDY","SFDC Portland","SFDC Tokyo","SFDC MC","SFDC MC Dublin","SFDC MC Hyderabad","SFDC MC INDY","SFDC MC Portland","SFDC MC Tokyo","SFDC PDT",
"SFDC PDT Dublin",
"SFDC PDT Hyderabad",
"SFDC PDT INDY",
"SFDC PDT Portland",
"SFDC PDT Tokyo",
"SFDC SB",
"SFDC SB Dublin",
"SFDC SB Hyderabad",
"SFDC SB INDY",
"SFDC SB Portland",
"SFDC Tokyo",
"SFDC SB Portland",
"SFDC SB Tokyo"] then "SFDC"  when 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "ACN" then "ACN"  when ('Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "Cognizant" or 'Support_Case_Owner_Group__c' matches "CTS")  then "CTS" else "Others" end
computedFields.label: BillingVendor

computedFields.name: SignatureOrSupport
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' in ["MCS Primary","MCS Technical","MCS" , "MCS Technical Lead" ," MCS SWAT"]  then "Signature" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' not in ["MCS Primary","MCS Technical","MCS","CS","FS", "SAS",             "Support Operations", "VERT", "ProM Management",                   "ProM Portfolio Monitoring", "ProM Technical Engineer",                    "Regional Specialist - ADR","Regional Specialist - CSR",                    "Regional Specialist Lead","Specialist  SC ADR",                 "Specialist  SC CSR", "Specialist - Other",                   "Specialist - Regional", "Specialist - Regional CSR",                    "Specialist - Regional Graduate","Specialist - Regional Manager","Specialist - SC ADR", "Specialist - SC CSR",                    "Specialist - SC Manager","Specialist - SFDO",                   "Specialist - Success Hub","Specialist - Success Hub Management","Specialist Operations", "Specialist Regional","Specialists","Specialists Operations",                    "Success Center Specialist - ADR","Success Center Specialist - CSR","Success Center Specialist Manager",                    "Success Specialist Lead","MCS Technical Lead" , " MCS SWAT"] then "Support" when 'Support_Case_Owner_Subgroup__c' in ["ProM Management","ProM Technical Engineer"]  then "PROM" else "NA" end
computedFields.label: SignatureOrSupport

computedFields.name: DevOrNondev
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Skill_Group__c' in ["Developer"]  then "Dev" else "Non Dev" end
computedFields.label: DevOrNondev

computedFields.name: VendorManagerFinal
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'VendorManager.Name' is null then 'Support_Case_Owner__C_Manager.Name' else 'VendorManager.Name' end
computedFields.label: VendorManagerFinal
